title: Potion of stabbing
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Potion                                                                                         |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Potion of Stabbing                                                                             |
| Icon | [![Potion of stabbing.png](/images/f/fc/Potion_of_stabbing.png)](/File:Potion_of_stabbing.png) |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A potion which makes the drinker better at attacking unaware enemies, giving attacks against distracted, confused or otherwise unaware creatures a chance to deal increased damage as if the target were completely helpless. |

**Potions of stabbing** grant your character the Stab [status effect](/Status_effect "Status effect") for `1d40 + 34` (more) turns, up to a max of 80. This gives [stabbing](/Stabbing "Stabbing") attacks you do against creatures that are confused, distracted, blind, netted, etc. a chance of being upgraded to [sleep](/Sleep "Sleep")-level stabs.

This potion is rather situational -- it can be a significant boon to stealthy characters or those who invest in [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes"), disabling [wands](/Wand "Wand"), or [summoned](/Summon "Summon") allies, but heavily armored brutes, ranged weapon specialists, and pure mages will have few opportunities to make use of the benefits.

As [The Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One") prevents you from making any stabbing attacks at all, its followers have no use for potions of stabbing. Characters that are lucky enough to have found the [Spriggan's Knife](/Spriggan%27s_Knife "Spriggan's Knife") can just use that, as it already provides a more reliable version of this potion's effects.

> Quaff Normally: "You feel ready to backstab."  
> Quaff While Stabbing: "You feel more ready to backstab."

## History

- Removed in [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), replaced by the [potion of attraction](/Potion_of_attraction "Potion of attraction").
- Introduced in [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), replacing [potions of agility](/Potions_of_agility "Potions of agility").

| [Potions](/Potion "Potion")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Ambrosia](/Potion_of_ambrosia "Potion of ambrosia") • [Attraction](/Potion_of_attraction "Potion of attraction") • [Berserk rage](/Potion_of_berserk_rage "Potion of berserk rage") • [Brilliance](/Potion_of_brilliance "Potion of brilliance") • [Cancellation](/Potion_of_cancellation "Potion of cancellation") • [Curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing") • [Degeneration](/Potion_of_degeneration "Potion of degeneration") • [Enlightenment](/Potion_of_enlightenment "Potion of enlightenment") • [Experience](/Potion_of_experience "Potion of experience") • [Haste](/Potion_of_haste "Potion of haste") • [Heal wounds](/Potion_of_heal_wounds "Potion of heal wounds") • [Invisibility](/Potion_of_invisibility "Potion of invisibility") • [Lignification](/Potion_of_lignification "Potion of lignification") • [Magic](/Potion_of_magic "Potion of magic") • [Might](/Potion_of_might "Potion of might") • [Mutation](/Potion_of_mutation "Potion of mutation") • [Resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance") |
html:
Potion of stabbing

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Potion
Name Potion of Stabbing
Icon
A potion which makes the drinker better at attacking unaware enemies, giving attacks against distracted, confused or otherwise unaware creatures a chance to deal increased damage as if the target were completely helpless.

Potions of stabbing grant your character the Stab status effect for 1d40 + 34 (more) turns, up to a max of 80. This gives stabbing attacks you do against creatures that are confused, distracted, blind, netted, etc. a chance of being upgraded to sleep-level stabs.

This potion is rather situational -- it can be a significant boon to stealthy characters or those who invest in Hexes, disabling wands, or summoned allies, but heavily armored brutes, ranged weapon specialists, and pure mages will have few opportunities to make use of the benefits.

As The Shining One prevents you from making any stabbing attacks at all, its followers have no use for potions of stabbing. Characters that are lucky enough to have found the Spriggan's Knife can just use that, as it already provides a more reliable version of this potion's effects.

Quaff Normally: "You feel ready to backstab."
Quaff While Stabbing: "You feel more ready to backstab."

History

  • Removed in 0.26, replaced by the potion of attraction.
  • Introduced in 0.25, replacing potions of agility.
